Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 29 STRIKE UAVs KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ On the 15th of September...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 29 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 15, 2024, the enemy was hit by 3 armored aircraft missiles X- 59 from the vast expanse of the Kursk region - Russian Federation. and 29 attack UAVs of the Shahed type from the regions of Primorsko-Akhtars, Yeisk, Kursk - Russian Federation.💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, the destruction of mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, aviation, anti-aircraft missiles and with the help of the REB of the Povitryanih Forces, 29 enemy UAVs were shot down Mykolayiv, Cherkassy, ​​Kirovograd, Kherson, Zaporizhzhya, Sumy, Chernigiv and Kiev regions. Thank you for your combat work!🇺🇦 Together - to victory!➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Air Force, Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
